Path independence: CLI uses /home/dash/.zion/, Web uses /home/user/ZION/, GitHub unifies both.

key_breakthroughs.insight: AUTONOMOUS CUSTOMER SERVICE - Full AGI-level customer retention system. ZION reads unread WhatsApp messages, analyzes intent (payment? question? complaint?), auto-replies when confident (80%+ threshold), flags complex issues for manual review. INBOUND (reply to customers) + OUTBOUND (recovery campaign) + CONTINUOUS (monitor every 15min). Auto-reply patterns: payment confirmations (90%), pricing questions (95%), renewal requests (90%), status checks (85%). Manual review: complaints, negotiations, VIP customers, <80% confidence. Vision: 'If you can actually reply to my unread messages I will be a happy man' - Z. Impact: Inbox zero + 534k GNF recovery + Z focuses on growth not support.

Expected recovery: 534,338 GNF from 2,022,851 GNF at risk. Churn reduction: 37.8% → target <20%. Next: Deploy continuous monitoring, scale to 500+ customers, replicate across Guinea.
